summary: Lots of new lore friendly armor and weapons (still in beta)
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/z88pYRx.png[/img]
[center][color=#00ff00][size=5]------------------------------------------------------
[i]->PUT ON HOLD<-[/i]
SOME OF THESE ARMORS WILL BE RELEASED
[/size][/color][size=5][color=#ffff00]AS[/color] [u][color=#cc4125]SEPERATE DOWNLOADS[/color][/u][color=#ffff00] TO BE MADE AT THE SKY FORGE[/color]
[/size][color=#00ff00][size=5]expect new armor mods soon.
only modding skyrim se atm... some of these armors will make it to se !
----------------------------------------------------[/size][/color]
[size=3]This is a BETA for the Legendary Armory mod, things will/can change
And more items will be added !!! [/size]

[color=#ffff00][size=4]Dragonborn dlc is needed[/size][/color]
------------------------------------------------------
[size=3]Released:

[color=#ff7700][size=4]-> ARMOR <-[/size][/color] pictures above show them.

- Gae armor set / Heavy armor
- Ebony Archmage set / Heavy Armor
- Griphon Elven set / Heavy Armor
- Berserker Dragonscale set / Heavy Armor
- Stalhrim Conquerer set + hood / Heavy armor-hood is light
- Shadow Scream set / Light Armor

[color=#ff7700][size=4]-> Weapons <-[/size][/color]Â  pictures above show them.

- Curse of Old / 1h sword
- Griphon Elven Mace /1h mace
- Song of Screams / 2h sword
- Shine of Fire / 2h sword
- Cruel Orchish Axe / 1h axe
- Nordic Fae Blades / 1h warglaive (new type)
- Gae Fae Blades / 1h Warglaive (new type)
[/size]
------------------------------------------------------
FIXES :
....
------------------------------------------------------
NEXT UPDATE WILL BE
[i]- Barbasos Armor set (based on the death dealer from frank frazetta).
- 2h Axe (no name yet)
- Daedric Fae Blades
- better 1st person models
- able to upgrade the armors and weapons[/i]
------------------------------------------------------
[size=4]WHERE?
At dragonreach, find a door and enter it.
There will be a forge there called legendary forge.
All items can only be created at the legendary forge ![/size]
------------------------------------------------------
Planned:
Inventory models
More armor sets !
More weapons !
Shields !
Quest
New Enemies
new ingot and ore types
------------------------------------------------------
FAQ:
can i use this in my mod?
NO...
please?
no, sorry.
How long will the beta last?
Till all is finnished.. i cant put a date on this.
Why beta?
just wanted to release the already finnished armor sets !
Female models?
Will come later on. for now its the same mesh.
------------------------------------------------------
[size=4][b]Screenshots are welcome ![/b][/size]

REQUESTS are welcome !!!
put you'r requests in the request section !

Teaser section will be for teasers of upcomming armor/weapons etc.
Keep an eye out and give some feedback ! no spamming please.

Bug section.. for bugs..
